trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 2 other sightings in New York on or around July 13th 2009
Summary: Bright light, looked like moving star, followed a zig zag path for about 4 minutes before fading away.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy friends and I were playing frisbee in a huge empty parking lot, and then at 10:39 the lights went out.(They turn off that time every night because of a timer) We looked up at the stars because the sky was really clear. We all noticed a little bright light that looked like a star, only it was moving. We kept watching, and it kept moving in a slow straight path. We know we were watching it for about 4 minutes because our friend called right after, and that was at 10:45. While we were all watching, we saw it dart very quickly to the side..like it was zig-zagging back and forth..but very fast, and then going straight again on its original path. It did that a bunch of times, then it started to fade in and out, and finally it faded out completely. There was no way it was a plane, and we are all certain of that. It was definitely a cool experience!
